channel.title: Tools on Portal Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Tools on Portal Documentation

item.title: Portal Browser Extension
item.description: Portal Browser Extension Extension Plugins Portal Browser Extension The BF2042 Portal Extensions is a Browser Extension that adds additional functionality to the Battlefield Portal Rules Editor. It also allows users to create plugins in order to add even more functionality to the browser extension. Extension Plugins The community has created a lot of plugins for the Browser Extension, which enhance the usability and speed to work on Portal Experiences even more.
